title: Why a home bar is the new status symbol - and what to wear when serving cocktails
text:
Call it hygge with an added dash of Angostura bitters, but right now, all roads lead to the home bar.

Picking up on this convivial movement in the domestic lives of its clients, Cartier has launched a collection of barware ideally suited to the bon vivant. The maison has created a range of London Exclusives that includes the Jacques Cartier Cocktail Collection, named after founder Louis's younger brother, who first set up shop in the capital at the turn of the last century. Jacques was responsible for installing the English Artworks workshop in 1922, which still resides at the flagship Bond Street store.
